Reading Video¶

Module for StreamParser class.

class downsmash.stream_parser.StreamParser(filename, debug=False)¶

This class is effectively a wrapper around OpenCV’s VideoCapture class that provides utility functions for parsing video streams.

get_frame(time=None, color=False)¶

Attempt to retrieve a frame from self.stream.

Parameters:
  • time: If set, get the frame nearest to this timestamp.

    If unset, get the next frame in sequence.

  • color: If false, convert the frame from color to grayscale.

locate(scenes, feature, roi=None, matcher=<downsmash.template_matcher.TemplateMatcher object>)¶

asdfkjasdlfjas

sample_frames(start=None, end=None, interval=None, num_samples=None, fuzz=0, color=False)¶
